name: Alexandre Passant
shortbio: I'm a Hacker, an Entrepreneur and a Researcher. I love to Build, Learn and Share. I care about the Web. I'm trying to make it a better place, and I'm having fun doing it.

work.name: seevl
work.description: A data-driven music-discovery platform, the best way to discover music that matters to you.

work.name: MDG Web
work.description: seevl's parent company, building new ways to imagine music discovery and consumption.

work.name: mesagraph
work.description: Unlocking social media to help organizations and individuals make faster, better decisions.

work.name: Music Ontology
work.description: The reference ontology to describe music and music meta-data on the Semantic Web.

work.name: SIOC
work.description: The reference ontology to represent communities and their activities on the Semantic Web.

work.name: W3C
work.description: Developping open standards to ensure the long-term growth of the Web.

sharing.name: Blogs
sharing.description: Tech posts on my personal and company blog.

sharing.name: Talks
sharing.description: Slides of my recent talks, generally in-depth tech talks.

sharing.name: Q&A
sharing.description: My contributions to Quora - tech, music and tattoos.
